attributes.action: Put the school time 30 - 90 minutes less. And rise a little bit teachers pay.
attributes.additional_details: It’s better for Childs mental health, I mean. I think no one wants to stay 6+ hours in a building, teachers would be soo dried and so tired. Later kids have to do homework and study and teachers, have to think more things/homework for the next day, it’s really necessary! SIGN THIS PETITION.
attributes.background: I want the UK to put less time in school hours, they are really long and uneccesary, but don’t delete the recess for this! Breaks and recess are necessary to talk, play, be social, and discover. They are good so they have more energy in the break time! :)

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647191

If you would like the Government to increase pay for teaching staff you could start a separate petition requesting this.
